name: Mech Mind
description:
In the far future, horrendous beasts have conquered the earth and your task is to eliminate them all or... survive.

* You have 3 types of mechs: artillery, tank and healer.

* Upon killing an enemy, you will gain more energy.


* You can buy new mechs for energy.


* Battles are automatic.


Made for Wowie Game Jam 2022.

Special thanks for main OST to gashishix.
